translated: The pervasion is the observation of a contradictory pervasion, because the nominalizers do not conceive of the hairs and so on that are observed by those with eye disease as being objects.

original: cha 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yang rang rigs pa'i yul can nyid yin pa'i phyir dpe ma grub pa nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: cha 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yang rang rigs pa'i yul can nyid yin pa'i phyir dpe ma grub pa nyid ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Isn‚Äôt the example unestablished because the aspect that apprehends the part is the object of its own type?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: de ni rang rig pa'i shes pa nyid du skyes pa nyid na rig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni rang rig pa'i shes pa nyid du skyes pa nyid na rig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is born as the cognition of self-awareness itself, it is awareness.

original: ci ste shes pa gzhan gyis tha dad par brtags nas 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yul nyid yin pa de'i tshe rang rig pa yang de bzhin du yul nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ste shes pa gzhan gyis tha dad par brtags nas 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yul nyid yin pa de'i tshe rang rig pa yang de bzhin du yul nyid yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is imagined to be different by another cognition, and the aspect of apprehension is the object, then self-awareness would be the object in the same way.

original: de bas na rnam pa tha dad pa med pa can ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na rnam pa tha dad pa med pa can ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, that which does not have a different aspect is not the entity of apprehended object and apprehending subject.

original: 'dra dang mi 'dra nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: 'dra dang mi 'dra nyid kyi phyir //
translated: Because of being similar and dissimilar,

original: yul gsum pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gsum pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: a third object does not exist.

original: 'dra ba gzhan dang thun mong ba gang yin pa 'di ni spyi'i ngo bo yin la mi 'dra ba phan tshun ldog pa thun mong ma yin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'dra ba gzhan dang thun mong ba gang yin pa 'di ni spyi'i ngo bo yin la mi 'dra ba phan tshun ldog pa thun mong ma yin pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: That which is similar and shared in common with another is the universal nature, and that which is dissimilar and mutually exclusive and not shared in common is the particular characteristic.

original: yul de las tha dad pa'i yul rtogs pa na 'dra ba'am mi 'dra bar 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: yul de las tha dad pa'i yul rtogs pa na 'dra ba'am mi 'dra bar 'gyur grang na /
translated: When a cognition of an object different from that is produced, is it similar or dissimilar?

original: thun mong nyid yin na ni spyi yin la /
analyzed: thun mong nyid yin na ni spyi yin la /
translated: If it is shared in common, it is a universal.

original: thun mong nyid ma yin na ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: thun mong nyid ma yin na ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin pa de ltar na /
translated: If it is not common, then it is a specific property.

original: de gnyis las 'das pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de gnyis las 'das pa ma yin no //
translated: Thus, it does not transcend those two.

original: sgra'i yul dang yul min phyir //
analyzed: sgra'i yul dang yul min phyir //
translated: Because of being the object or non-object of words,

original: yul gnyis las don gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: yul gnyis las don gzhan ma yin no //
translated: it is not a different object from those two.

original: sgra'i yul gang yin pa de ni spyi yin la /
analyzed: sgra'i yul gang yin pa de ni spyi yin la /
translated: That which is the object of words is a universal.

original: sgra'i yul ma yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: sgra'i yul ma yin pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid do //
translated: That which is not the object of words is a specific property.

original: de gal te sgra'i yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de gal te sgra'i yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If it is the object of words,

original: de ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin la /
analyzed: de ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin la /
translated: then it is a universal.

original: ci ste sgra'i yul ma yin pa de'i @124a * //
analyzed: ci ste sgra'i yul ma yin pa de'i @124a * //
translated: But if it is not the object of words,

original: tshe rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: tshe rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: then it is a specific property.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyang sgra'i yul ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyang sgra'i yul ma yin te /
translated: A specific property is not the object of words,

original: sngar bstan zin pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'dir yang mthong ba bzhin du sgras sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la so sor snang ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro//
analyzed: sngar bstan zin pa nyid kyi phyir dang / 'dir yang mthong ba bzhin du sgras sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la so sor snang ba med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston par 'gyur ba nyid kyi phyir ro//
translated: because it has already been explained previously, and because it will be explained here as well, that just as in perception, words do not individually appear to the cognition that arises from words.

original: de bas na sgra'i yul dang yul ma yin pa gnyis las yul gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na sgra'i yul dang yul ma yin pa gnyis las yul gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, apart from the object and the non-object, there is no other object.

original: yul las rgyu mtshan gzhan /
analyzed: yul las rgyu mtshan gzhan /
translated: The reason is different from the object.

original: de yid la byed pa dang de dang rjes su mthun pa dang / brda 'dzin pa de dag yod pa na yul gang la blo yod pa'i yul de ni spyi yin no //
analyzed: de yid la byed pa dang de dang rjes su mthun pa dang / brda 'dzin pa de dag yod pa na yul gang la blo yod pa'i yul de ni spyi yin no //
translated: When there is the mental attention to that, the conformity with that, and the apprehension of the sign, then the object in regard to which the cognition exists is the universal.

original: skyes bu tha snyad 'dogs pa'o zhes pa'i ngor yul dang 'dra bas yul zhes brjod kyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu tha snyad 'dogs pa'o zhes pa'i ngor yul dang 'dra bas yul zhes brjod kyi don dam par ni ma yin no //
translated: The object is expressed as the object because it is similar to the object in the perspective of the conventional designation of the person, but not ultimately.

original: yul ma rtogs par rgyu mtshan gzhan te /
analyzed: yul ma rtogs par rgyu mtshan gzhan te /
translated: The reason is different from the object.

original: mig dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa'i rgyu de dag yod na yang /
analyzed: mig dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa la sogs pa'i rgyu de dag yod na yang /
translated: Even when those causes such as the eye, light, and mental attention exist,

original: gang med na blo med pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: gang med na blo med pa de ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: that in the absence of which there is no cognition is the particular.

original: de ni gal te yid la byed pa la sogs pa'i dngos po tsam yin na /
analyzed: de ni gal te yid la byed pa la sogs pa'i dngos po tsam yin na /
translated: If that is merely the entity of mental attention and so on,üîΩthen when cognition arises in regard to the third object that is imagined, at that time it is the universal. But if it is the particular,

original: ji ltar kun du brtags pa'i yul gsum par mngon par 'dod pa la blo 'byung ba de'i tshe de spyi yin zhing ci ste /
analyzed: ji ltar kun du brtags pa'i yul gsum par mngon par 'dod pa la blo 'byung ba de'i tshe de spyi yin zhing ci ste /
translated: then how can there be the cognition of the universal?

original: yid la byed pa la sogs pa yod na yang de med na blo mi 'byung ba de'i tshe rang gi mtshan nyid yin pa de ltar na yul gyi rnam pa gnyis kho na yin no //
analyzed: yid la byed pa la sogs pa yod na yang de med na blo mi 'byung ba de'i tshe rang gi mtshan nyid yin pa de ltar na yul gyi rnam pa gnyis kho na yin no //
translated: If there is attention, etc., then the mind arises, but if there is not, then it does not arise. At that time, it is the intrinsic identity. Thus, there are only two aspects of the object.

original: don byed par nus pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid la sogs pa la /
analyzed: don byed par nus pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid rang gi mtshan nyid la sogs pa la /
translated: The capacity to perform a function, etc., is the characteristic of reality itself, intrinsic identity, etc.

original: don dam par don byed nus gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: don dam par don byed nus gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: It should be applied to the statement, ‚ÄúThat which is ultimately able to perform a function, etc.‚Äù

original: don ni 'bras bu yin la de'i byed pa ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: don ni 'bras bu yin la de'i byed pa ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: The object is the effect, and its function is to be produced.

original: don byed pa de'i nus gang ste /
analyzed: don byed pa de'i nus gang ste /
translated: That which is able to perform the function of the object is the intrinsic identity.

original: rang nye bas skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de de 'dir te bstan bcos 'dir don dam par yod pa yin /
analyzed: rang nye bas skyed par byed pa gang yin pa de de 'dir te bstan bcos 'dir don dam par yod pa yin /
translated: That which is able to produce the effect is the intrinsic identity. Here, in this treatise, it is ultimately existent.

original: dngos po yod par 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: dngos po yod par 'dod pa yin no //
translated: It is asserted that things exist.

original: gzhan te / rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis 'bras bu 'ga' zhig kyang nus pa med pa gang yin pa de ni kun rdzob tu yod par 'dod do //
analyzed: gzhan te / rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis 'bras bu 'ga' zhig kyang nus pa med pa gang yin pa de ni kun rdzob tu yod par 'dod do //
translated: Otherwise, that which is not able to produce any effect in any way whatsoever is asserted to exist conventionally.

original: de ltar na mi 'dra ba gang yin pa de ni don dam par yod pa yin zhing 'dra ba ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na mi 'dra ba gang yin pa de ni don dam par yod pa yin zhing 'dra ba ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, what is different is ultimately existent, and what is similar is conventionally existent.

original: sgra'i yul ma yin pa de ni don dam par yod pa yin zhing sgra'i yul yin pa ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i yul ma yin pa de ni don dam par yod pa yin zhing sgra'i yul yin pa ni kun rdzob tu yod pa yin no //
translated: What is not the object of sound is ultimately existent, and what is the object of sound is conventionally existent.

original: rgyu mtshan gzhan yod na yang gang zhig med na blo med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam par @124b yod pa yin zhing /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gzhan yod na yang gang zhig med na blo med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam par @124b yod pa yin zhing /
translated: If there is another reason, then what is absent when the cognition is absent is ultimately existent.

original: gzhan ni kun rdzob tu yod pa ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan ni kun rdzob tu yod pa ma yin no zhes rtogs par bya'o //
translated: The other is conventionally existent. This should be understood.

original: don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu yod pa gzung bar bya ba de dag rang spyi'i mtshan nyid bshad /
analyzed: don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu yod pa gzung bar bya ba de dag rang spyi'i mtshan nyid bshad /
translated: The ultimate and conventional existences that are to be apprehended have been explained as the characteristics of the particular and the general.

original: don dam par yod pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin la /
analyzed: don dam par yod pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid yin la /
translated: Ultimate existence is the particular characteristic.

original: kun rdzob tu yod pa ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: kun rdzob tu yod pa ni spyi'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: Conventional existence is the general characteristic.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is how it is.

original: gal te thams cad nus med ces /
analyzed: gal te thams cad nus med ces /
translated: If all are powerless,

original: don dam par don byed nus pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na don dam par yod pa nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po la mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par don byed nus pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin pa de ltar na don dam par yod pa nyid du 'dod pa'i dngos po la mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But ultimately, there is not the slightest thing that is able to perform a function. Therefore, things that are asserted to ultimately exist do not have a characteristic.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang la yod pa ma yin pa de ni de'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang la yod pa ma yin pa de ni de'i mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: The syllogism is: Whatever does not exist in something is not the characteristic of that,

original: dper na rta la rva can nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na rta la rva can nyid lta bu'o //
translated: like the manedness of a horse.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid du 'dod pa la yang don byed nus pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o //üîΩsa bon sogs ni myu gu sogs la /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid du 'dod pa la yang don byed nus pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa mi dmigs pa'o // sa bon sogs ni myu gu sogs la /
translated: And, for those who assert that the characteristic is the ability to perform a function, the ability to perform a function does not exist. This is the non-observation of a pervasion.üîΩThe ability to perform a function is not the characteristic of things

original: nus mthong ste /
analyzed: nus mthong ste /
translated: Because the ability to perform a function is not seen in seeds and so on.

original: 'bras bu mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'bras bu mthong ngo //
translated: The effect is seen.

original: 'di ni 'di skad du gang zhig thag nye ba nyid yod na gang 'gyur ba de ni de la nus pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni 'di skad du gang zhig thag nye ba nyid yod na gang 'gyur ba de ni de la nus pa yin te /
translated: This is what it says: Whatever exists in the proximity of something is the ability of that,

original: don byed nus pa ni de tsam gyi mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don byed nus pa ni de tsam gyi mtshan nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the ability to perform a function has just that as its characteristic.

original: de ni sa bon la sogs pa ni myu gu la sogs pa la yod pa yin pa de ltar na gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni sa bon la sogs pa ni myu gu la sogs pa la yod pa yin pa de ltar na gtan tshigs ma grub pa yin no zhes ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: That is, if the seed and so on exist in the sprout and so on, then the reason is not established.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is so, but

original: gal te de kun rdzob 'dod na sa bon la sogs pa yod na myu gu la sogs pa skye ba gang yin pa de kun rdzob tu skye ba yin gyi don dam par ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te de kun rdzob 'dod na sa bon la sogs pa yod na myu gu la sogs pa skye ba gang yin pa de kun rdzob tu skye ba yin gyi don dam par ma yin no //
translated: if you assert that to be conventional, then the arising of the sprout and so on when the seed and so on exist is conventional arising, but not ultimate.

original: des na gal te don dam par skye ba'i dbang du byas nas dngos po'i mtshan nyid don byed nus pa yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: des na gal te don dam par skye ba'i dbang du byas nas dngos po'i mtshan nyid don byed nus pa yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: Therefore, if the characteristic of a thing is the ability to perform a function from the perspective of ultimate arising,

original: mtshon par bya ba khyab pa med pas mtshan nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshon par bya ba khyab pa med pas mtshan nyid ma yin no //
translated: then it is not a characteristic because it is not universal.

original: ci ste kun rdzob yin pa de'i tshe spyi la yang de yod pa de ltar na shin tu khyab pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan nyid 'chol bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste kun rdzob yin pa de'i tshe spyi la yang de yod pa de ltar na shin tu khyab pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan nyid 'chol bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if it is conventional, then it exists in universals as well, and in that case it is universal, and so the characteristics would be confused.

original: ji ltar de ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar de ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could that be?

original: kho bo cag gis don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid khyab pa med pa bshad pa des na /
analyzed: kho bo cag gis don byed nus pa'i mtshan nyid khyab pa med pa bshad pa des na /
translated: We have explained that the definition of the ability to perform a function is not universal.

original: don byed nus pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar mthong ba de bsnyon par nus pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de mtshan nyid yin zhing de la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ming 'dogs pa la brtsad pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don byed nus pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar mthong ba de bsnyon par nus pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de mtshan nyid yin zhing de la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du ming 'dogs pa la brtsad pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, whatever is seen to be able to perform a function is a characteristic, and it is not possible to dispute the designation of a name for it, as one wishes.

original: gzhan yang khyed kyis kun rdzob tu yod pa nyid du 'dod pa de yang ci yin /üîΩgang gis na kun rdzob tu skye @125a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang khyed kyis kun rdzob tu yod pa nyid du 'dod pa de yang ci yin / gang gis na kun rdzob tu skye @125a * //
translated: Moreover, what is it that you assert to exist conventionally?

original: bar 'dod kyi /
analyzed: bar 'dod kyi /
translated: By what means do you assert that it arises conventionally?

original: rnam pa gzhan du ma yin /
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du ma yin /
translated: Not in any other way.

original: gal te bdag nyid thams cad kyis med pa kun rdzob yin pa de ltar na kun rdzob ces brjod na mi nus pa dang / skye ba zhes brjod na nus par 'gyur ro //üîΩde ji ltar na nus pa dang mi nus pa dag phan tshun spangs te /
analyzed: gal te bdag nyid thams cad kyis med pa kun rdzob yin pa de ltar na kun rdzob ces brjod na mi nus pa dang / skye ba zhes brjod na nus par 'gyur ro // de ji ltar na nus pa dang mi nus pa dag phan tshun spangs te /
translated: If it is nonexistent in every way, it is not possible to say that it is conventional, and it is possible to say that it arises.

original: gnas ba'i mtshan nyid can gcig la ldan par 'gyur /
analyzed: gnas ba'i mtshan nyid can gcig la ldan par 'gyur /
translated: How could that which is possible and that which is impossible be mutually exclusive, and be present in one thing?

original: yang na kun rdzob kyi sgra skyes pa la sogs pa 'dod pa yin na /
analyzed: yang na kun rdzob kyi sgra skyes pa la sogs pa 'dod pa yin na /
translated: Or, if you accept that the word ‚Äúrelative‚Äù applies to what is produced,

original: des kyang skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i don dam pa'i mtshan nyid can du skye ba med pa yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: des kyang skye ba med pa la sogs pa'i don dam pa'i mtshan nyid can du skye ba med pa yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: then at that time, since non-production and so on are characterized by the ultimate, non-production and so on would be the ultimate.

original: gzhan dag kyang skye ba med pa la sogs pa dag skye bar mi 'dod pa de ltar na 'dod pa yin no //
analyzed: gzhan dag kyang skye ba med pa la sogs pa dag skye bar mi 'dod pa de ltar na 'dod pa yin no //
translated: In that case, you would have to accept that non-production and so on are produced, just as others assert.

original: 'on kyang skye bas skye ba zhes brjod pa na mi mdzes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on kyang skye bas skye ba zhes brjod pa na mi mdzes par 'gyur te /
translated: But if you say that production is produced by production, that is not elegant,

original: skye ba la rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skye ba la rnam pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other kind of production.

original: de ltar na de ni cir yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: de ltar na de ni cir yang mi rung ngo //
translated: In that case, it is not suitable in any way.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur mod kyi /
translated: This is so, but

original: gal te kun la de yod ces ji ltar de ltar 'gyur zhes khas len ba na kun rdzob kyang don byed nus par 'dod par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te kun la de yod ces ji ltar de ltar 'gyur zhes khas len ba na kun rdzob kyang don byed nus par 'dod par 'gyur na /
translated: if you accept that it is so, saying ‚ÄúIt exists in all,‚Äù then you would have to accept that the relative is able to perform a function.

original: de yang spyi la yang yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang spyi la yang yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: But that also exists in universals.

original: de bas na mtshan nyid 'khrul par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de bas na mtshan nyid 'khrul par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the definition would be mistaken.

original: de la / spyi yi mtshan nyid rjes 'gro ldog / ces bya ba la sogs pas lan 'de bas par byed do //
analyzed: de la / spyi yi mtshan nyid rjes 'gro ldog / ces bya ba la sogs pas lan 'de bas par byed do //
translated: The response to that is stated in the lines beginning: ‚ÄúThe universal is not perceived by the mind as something that follows or diverges.‚Äù

original: skyon de yod pa min te /
analyzed: skyon de yod pa min te /
translated: That fault does not exist.

original: spyi yi mtshan nyid rjes 'gro ldog / blo la mi snang phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi yi mtshan nyid rjes 'gro ldog / blo la mi snang phyir ro //
translated: The universal is not perceived by the mind as something that follows or diverges.

original: re zhig than rang gi yul la shes pa skyed pa gang yin pa dngos po rnams kyi don byed pa 'di yin no //
analyzed: re zhig than rang gi yul la shes pa skyed pa gang yin pa dngos po rnams kyi don byed pa 'di yin no //
translated: First, the capacity of things to produce cognition with regard to their own object is their function.

original: re zhig spyi ni blo la yang nus pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: re zhig spyi ni blo la yang nus pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: First, the universal does not have the capacity to appear to cognition.

original: de ltar na 'bad rtsol dang / brda tsam la rag las pa bum pa nyid la sogs par rtogs pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de ltar na 'bad rtsol dang / brda tsam la rag las pa bum pa nyid la sogs par rtogs pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur gyi /
translated: Thus, the cognition that understands ‚Äúpot‚Äù and so on arises in dependence on mere effort and mere convention.

original: bum pa nyid la sogs pa'i spyi'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa can ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: bum pa nyid la sogs pa'i spyi'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa can ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: It does not follow the universal of ‚Äúpot‚Äù and so on, nor does it diverge from it.

original: spyi'i mtshan nyid ni blo la nus pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin na /
analyzed: spyi'i mtshan nyid ni blo la nus pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin na /
translated: Since the universal does not have the capacity to appear to cognition in the slightest,

original: gang gis na shes pa de'i 'bras bur 'gyur /
analyzed: gang gis na shes pa de'i 'bras bur 'gyur /
translated: how could cognition be its effect?

original: yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa med par de'i 'bras bu nyid yin na /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa'i rjes su byed pa med par de'i 'bras bu nyid yin na /
translated: If it is the effect of that, without being subject to the existence or nonexistence of that,

original: rag las pa med pa gzhan yang ci'i phyir de'i 'bras bu nyid ma yin /
analyzed: rag las pa med pa gzhan yang ci'i phyir de'i 'bras bu nyid ma yin /
translated: then why is anything else, not dependent on it, not the effect of that?

original: de'i 'di bum pa'i rnam par snang ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu nyid yin na /
analyzed: de'i 'di bum pa'i rnam par snang ba dang 'brel pa'i phyir de'i 'bras bu nyid yin na /
translated: If it is the effect of that because it is related to the appearance of that in the form of a pot,

original: de 'di'i snang ba de dag las yin /
analyzed: de 'di'i snang ba de dag las yin /
translated: then it is the appearance of that from those.

original: de lta na ji ltar rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa mthong ba'i phyir de'i shes par mi 'gyur pa de ltar snang ba @125b la yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma mthong ba can nus pa med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: de lta na ji ltar rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa mthong ba'i phyir de'i shes par mi 'gyur pa de ltar snang ba @125b la yang rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa ma mthong ba can nus pa med pa nyid yin no //
translated: In that case, just as it is not the cognition of that because the concomitance and the reverse concomitance are not seen in the cognition of that, in the same way, the appearance is also not the effect of that because the concomitance and the reverse concomitance are not seen in the appearance.

original: de bas na spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa bum pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i blo la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de bas na spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa bum pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i blo la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the concomitance and the reverse concomitance of the universal do not exist in the conceptual cognition of a pot, etc.

original: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
analyzed: ci dang 'dra bar zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: mig dang gzugs sogs blo bzhin no //
analyzed: mig dang gzugs sogs blo bzhin no //
translated: Like the cognition of eye, form, etc.

original: mig la sogs pa bzhin dang / gzugs la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa bzhin dang / gzugs la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: like the eye, etc., and like form, etc.

original: sogs pa snga mas ni rna ba la sogs pa dang / gnyis pas ni sgra la sogs pa bzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa snga mas ni rna ba la sogs pa dang / gnyis pas ni sgra la sogs pa bzung ngo //
translated: The first ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the ear, etc., and the second ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes sound, etc.

original: ji ltar mig dang rna ba dang yid la byed pa dag yod na yang sngon po la sogs pas stong ba'i sa phyogs la der snang ba'i rnam par shes pa ldog cing /
analyzed: ji ltar mig dang rna ba dang yid la byed pa dag yod na yang sngon po la sogs pas stong ba'i sa phyogs la der snang ba'i rnam par shes pa ldog cing /
translated: Even when the eye, ear, and mental faculty are present, the consciousness that appears as that does not occur in a place that is empty of blue, etc.

original: yang nyen rjes su 'gro ba ltar bum pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yang nyen rjes su 'gro ba ltar bum pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: But the conception of a pot, etc. does not occur in that way.

original: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang yod na gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba de ni de las bzlog pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan la ltos par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gang zhig gang yod na gdon mi za bar 'gyur ba de ni de las bzlog pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan la ltos par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: The syllogism is: Whatever exists must be present when something else is present, and it cannot be that it is dependent on another cause that is different from it.

original: dper na mig dang bum pa'i gzugs dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa dag yod na nges par bum pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag las bzlog pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan la ltos par 'gyur ba ma yin pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na mig dang bum pa'i gzugs dang snang ba dang yid la byed pa dag yod na nges par bum pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ba de dag las bzlog pa'i rgyu mtshan gzhan la ltos par 'gyur ba ma yin pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, when the eye, the form of the pot, light, and attention are present, the form of the pot is certainly seen. It is not dependent on any other reason than those.

original: bum pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang bum pas stong pa'i sa phyogs dag la mthun pa'i 'bad rtsol dang brda 'dzin pa tsam yod na gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: bum pa'i rnam par rtog pa yang bum pas stong pa'i sa phyogs dag la mthun pa'i 'bad rtsol dang brda 'dzin pa tsam yod na gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa'o //
translated: Also, the conception of a pot occurs when there is mere effort in accordance with the place where the pot is empty and the apprehension of the sign.

original: gang zhig 'bras bu gang la rang nyid ldog pa'i rjes su byed pas nus pa mthong ba med pa can yin pa de ni de la rtog pa dang ldan pas nus pa nyid du gzung bar bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig 'bras bu gang la rang nyid ldog pa'i rjes su byed pas nus pa mthong ba med pa can yin pa de ni de la rtog pa dang ldan pas nus pa nyid du gzung bar bya ba ma yin te /
translated: That which is seen to be without the capacity to follow after the cessation of the effect is not to be apprehended as having the capacity by one who is endowed with conception.

original: dper na myu gu la gtan nas med pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na myu gu la gtan nas med pa lta bu'o //
translated: For example, it is like the utter nonexistence of a sprout.

original: spyi'i mtshan nyid kyang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi shes pa la rang nyid ldog pa'i rjes su byed pas nus pa mthong ba med pa can yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: spyi'i mtshan nyid kyang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi shes pa la rang nyid ldog pa'i rjes su byed pas nus pa mthong ba med pa can yin no zhes bya ba ni khyab par byed pa 'gal ba dmigs pa nyid yin no //
translated: Also, a universal does not have the capacity to appear to a cognition of a universal because it does not conform to its object.

original: gtan tshigs snga ma ni ma grub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs snga ma ni ma grub pa nyid yin no //
translated: The first reason is not established.

original: spyi bum pa nyid dang bral ba snam bu nyid la sogs pa la 'bad rtsol la sogs pa yod na yang bum pa'i spyi'i blo med pa'i phyir ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid ma yin nam de ltar nag rtan  tshigs ma grub pa yin no zhe
analyzed: spyi bum pa nyid dang bral ba snam bu nyid la sogs pa la 'bad rtsol la sogs pa yod na yang bum pa'i spyi'i blo med pa'i phyir ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid ma yin nam de ltar nag rtan  tshigs ma grub pa yin no zhe
translated: If a universal is devoid of vase, cloth, and so on, and if it is associated with effort and so on, then the cognition of a vase‚Äôs universal does not exist because it does not conform to its object.

original: na / ldog ped @126a * //
analyzed: na / ldog ped @126a * //
translated: The reason is not established.

original: 'dra ba las nus pa grub pa ma yin te /üîΩji ltar bum pas stong pa'i sa phyogs la de mthong ba la gzhol ba yang mthong ba grub pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: 'dra ba las nus pa grub pa ma yin te / ji ltar bum pas stong pa'i sa phyogs la de mthong ba la gzhol ba yang mthong ba grub pa ma yin pa de ltar na /
translated: The capacity is not established from similarity.üîΩJust as the cognition of a vase is not established in a place devoid of a vase,

original: gal te ci shes par 'dod pa las yang de'i shes pa mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te ci shes par 'dod pa las yang de'i shes pa mi 'gyur na /
translated: if the cognition of a vase does not arise from what is desired to be known,

original: de ltar ni 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur ro //
translated: It would be so.

original: yang bum pa'i rjes su byed pa can gyi rnam par rtog pa la snang ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes pa tha dad pa'i ngo bo can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang bum pa'i rjes su byed pa can gyi rnam par rtog pa la snang ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes pa tha dad pa'i ngo bo can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, the non-appearance of the conceptual cognition that conforms to the pot is because it has the nature of a different cognition.

original: de la de'i yul med pa'i phyir ma yin zhing shes pa gzhan gyi ngo bo gzhan gyi yin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de la de'i yul med pa'i phyir ma yin zhing shes pa gzhan gyi ngo bo gzhan gyi yin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: It is not because its object does not exist, nor does it become the nature of another cognition.

original: the tshom za ba dang nges pa yin no //
analyzed: the tshom za ba dang nges pa yin no //
translated: It is doubtful and certain.

original: gal te yul med pa'i phyir mi 'gyur na yul zhig pa la yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te yul med pa'i phyir mi 'gyur na yul zhig pa la yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it does not occur because the object does not exist, then it would not occur even when the object is destroyed.

original: gal te spyi 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gal te spyi 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it occurs because the destruction of the universal does not exist,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: it is not so.

original: spyi 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spyi 'ba' zhig 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the apprehension of the universal alone does not exist.

original: de nyid kyi phyir rten chod pa can la sogs pa 'dzin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir rten chod pa can la sogs pa 'dzin pa ma yin no //
translated: For that very reason, it does not apprehend the obstructed support and so on.
